sentences.english: My dream is to work full-time at home.
sentences.chinese: 我的夢想是全職在家裏。

sentences.english: Prepare your filet mignon with advice from a full-time cook in this free video on steak.
sentences.chinese: 準備你的意見菲力從這個免費視頻全職煮牛排。

sentences.english: Among full-time workers, the figure rose to 35%.
sentences.chinese: 從事全職工作的女性這一比例爲35%。

sentences.english: Ms Oyeyemi does not believe that she will become a full-time 5 writer, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，歐耶米認爲她不會成爲一名全職作家。

sentences.english: They were all dual-earner couples -- both husband and wife held full-time jobs.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象都是雙職工，即夫婦二人都有全職工作。

sentences.english: I am a retired principal, and now a District Board Councillor in Shatin.
sentences.chinese: 本人爲退休小學校長，現任沙田區全職區議員。

sentences.english: He was a printing-press foreman, and my mother was a housewife.
sentences.chinese: 他是一家印刷廠的工頭，而我媽媽是全職太太。

sentences.english: Don't know how to parlay an internship into a full-time position?
sentences.chinese: 不知道怎樣把握實習機會獲得一份全職工作？

sentences.english: Saya will start teaching full-time after passing a trial term at a Tokyo primary school.
sentences.chinese: 如果通過試用期，她將開始她的全職教師生涯。

sentences.english: When out of work, treat the job hunt as a full-time job.
sentences.chinese: 失業時，要把找工作當成一份全職工作來做。

sentences.english: Can you fix me up with a full-time job?
sentences.chinese: 可以幫我安排一份全職工作嗎？

sentences.english: Steering a child through all this almost amounts to a full-time job.
sentences.chinese: 承擔着“操控”孩子這份全職工作。

sentences.english: All the while, he still worked full-time at HODI.
sentences.chinese: 在那段時間，史提芬仍然在HODI全職工作。

sentences.english: I'm lucky I've got a full-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸運，我有一個全職的工作。

sentences.english: First off, the research highlights the need for greater flexibility for people working full-time.
sentences.chinese: 首先，研究強調全職工作的人需要更多的靈活性。

definition: to be employed/to be in post/on-the-job
to promote to a higher position
to go for/to engage in/to undertake/to deal with/to handle/to do
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
